name: Main Leaderboard
query: SELECT purple_agent_id as id, purple_agent_name, COUNT(*) as total_tasks, SUM(CASE WHEN task_passed THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as tasks_passed, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN task_passed THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2) as pass_rate FROM read_json_auto('results/*.json') GROUP BY purple_agent_id, purple_agent_name ORDER BY pass_rate DESC
